job_details.Vacaturetitel: Senior AI Engineer, 2 Hour Learning (Remote) - $100,000/year USD
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you a full-stack AI wizard ready to redefine the frontier of K-12 learning? Join the education revolution at 2 Hour Learning!

   At 2 Hour Learning, we're not just talking about transforming education - we're proving it with hard data. Our learning ecosystem harnesses cutting-edge AI, learning science, and psychometrics to create a digital learning environment that's twice as effective as traditional schooling. High schoolers ace AP exams, middle schoolers advance 2 grade levels per year, and even kindergarteners shatter learning goals.

   You'll play a pivotal role in architecting this AI-powered learning revolution. You'll wield autonomy and creative freedom to envision, code, and ship sophisticated full-stack applications and interactive AI tools that engage students and drive learning efficiency to unprecedented heights.

   This isn't a role for AI dabblers or back-end-only coders. We seek bold AI architects who can seamlessly weave AI magic across front-end interfaces, back-end algorithms, and end-to-end product experiences. You'll own and optimize the entire product lifecycle, partnering closely with stakeholders to ensure we're nailing learner needs., * Continually experimenting with and integrating the latest generative AI tech to pioneer novel educational experiences
     * Owning end-to-end product lifecycle, from gathering requirements to development, launch and iterative enhancement
     * Partnering with stakeholders to align development with learner needs and garner insights to fuel cycles of innovation
     * Leveraging AI-driven automation across testing, debugging and beyond to maximize development velocity and robustness

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Coding narrow AI features in isolation of overarching product goals and learner needs
     * Implementing AI in a superficial, "buzzwordy" way that doesn't drive material learning gains
     * Toiling away at small-scale internal demos; your applications will drive learning impact for thousands
     * Waiting for others to define product requirements or conduct user research; you'll lead the charge
     * Wasting hours on manual QA; you'll leverage AI-powered testing to maximize efficiency, Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students.
job_details.full_text:
Senior AI Engineer, 2 Hour Learning (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

Are you a full-stack AI wizard ready to redefine the frontier of K-12 learning? Join the education revolution at 2 Hour Learning!

   At 2 Hour Learning, we're not just talking about transforming education - we're proving it with hard data. Our learning ecosystem harnesses cutting-edge AI, learning science, and psychometrics to create a digital learning environment that's twice as effective as traditional schooling. High schoolers ace AP exams, middle schoolers advance 2 grade levels per year, and even kindergarteners shatter learning goals.

   You'll play a pivotal role in architecting this AI-powered learning revolution. You'll wield autonomy and creative freedom to envision, code, and ship sophisticated full-stack applications and interactive AI tools that engage students and drive learning efficiency to unprecedented heights.

   This isn't a role for AI dabblers or back-end-only coders. We seek bold AI architects who can seamlessly weave AI magic across front-end interfaces, back-end algorithms, and end-to-end product experiences. You'll own and optimize the entire product lifecycle, partnering closely with stakeholders to ensure we're nailing learner needs., * Continually experimenting with and integrating the latest generative AI tech to pioneer novel educational experiences
     * Owning end-to-end product lifecycle, from gathering requirements to development, launch and iterative enhancement
     * Partnering with stakeholders to align development with learner needs and garner insights to fuel cycles of innovation
     * Leveraging AI-driven automation across testing, debugging and beyond to maximize development velocity and robustness

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Coding narrow AI features in isolation of overarching product goals and learner needs
     * Implementing AI in a superficial, "buzzwordy" way that doesn't drive material learning gains
     * Toiling away at small-scale internal demos; your applications will drive learning impact for thousands
     * Waiting for others to define product requirements or conduct user research; you'll lead the charge
     * Wasting hours on manual QA; you'll leverage AI-powered testing to maximize efficiency, Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students.

job_profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building user-facing applications powered by generative AI, including fine-tuning and integrating the latest generative AI tech. The role requires full-stack development to ship these applications and manage their lifecycle, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.

phrases: redefine the frontier of K-12 learning
transforming education
align development with learner needs
gather requirements
learner needs and garner insights to fuel cycles of innovation
drive learning impact for thousands
ensure we're nailing learner needs
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate a need to understand the educational context, business goals of transforming learning, and translating learner needs into technical requirements and product features.

phrases: cutting-edge AI
harnesses cutting-edge AI
AI-powered learning revolution
sophisticated full-stack applications and interactive AI tools
seamlessly weave AI magic across front-end interfaces, back-end algorithms
integrating the latest generative AI tech
pioneer novel educational experiences
Leveraging AI-driven automation across testing, debugging and beyond
Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications
job_tasks.justification: The description repeatedly mentions 'AI', 'generative AI tech', and 'interactive AI tools', indicating a focus on developing and integrating AI models, particularly generative ones, into applications.

phrases: full-stack AI wizard
architecting this AI-powered learning revolution
code, and ship sophisticated full-stack applications
full-stack AI architects
seamlessly weave AI magic across front-end interfaces, back-end algorithms, and end-to-end product experiences
Owning end-to-end product lifecycle, from gathering requirements to development, launch and iterative enhancement
Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications
job_tasks.justification: The role explicitly calls for 'full-stack' development, 'coding', 'shipping applications', and owning the 'end-to-end product lifecycle', which are core software development responsibilities.

phrases: Owning end-to-end product lifecycle, from gathering requirements to development, launch and iterative enhancement
Leveraging AI-driven automation across testing, debugging and beyond to maximize development velocity and robustness
Wasting hours on manual QA; you'll leverage AI-powered testing to maximize efficiency
job_tasks.justification: The emphasis on owning the 'end-to-end product lifecycle', including 'launch and iterative enhancement', and using 'AI-driven automation' for 'testing' and 'debugging' points to MLOps practices for production systems.
